==Trivia==
* The [[Furnishing]] "[[Hot Spring Retreat: Tidal Surge]]" is designed to resemble Atlahua's Net.
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Atlahua}}'' was a water God, fisherman and archer from the {{w|Aztec mythology}}. His name means "lord of the waters" in {{w|Nahuatl}}.
